org.openhubframework.openhub.api.file

Interface FileRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultFileRepository

    public interface FileRepository
    Contract for storing files in the repository and manipulating with them.

    Supposed workflow:

    1. save file into temporary store (file will be in this store for limited time only)
    2. commit saving file - the file will be moved from temporary folder to the target place
    Author:
    Petr Juza

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void commitFile(String fileId, String fileName, FileContentTypeExtEnum contentType, List<String> subFolders)
      Commits saving file - the file will be moved from temporary folder to the target place.
      boolean isFileIdValid(String fileId)
      Is specified file ID valid identifier? In other words is there file with specified identifier?
      String saveTempFile(OutputStreamWriterCallback writerCallback)
      Saves temporary file in the repository.

    • Method Detail

      • saveTempFile

        String saveTempFile(OutputStreamWriterCallback writerCallback)
        Saves temporary file in the repository.
        Parameters:
        writerCallback - the callback for writing file to specified output stream
        Returns:
        new unique file identifier

      • isFileIdValid

        boolean isFileIdValid(String fileId)
        Is specified file ID valid identifier? In other words is there file with specified identifier?
        Parameters:
        fileId - the file ID
        Returns:
        true if file is valid otherwise false

      • commitFile

        void commitFile(String fileId,
              String fileName,
              FileContentTypeExtEnum contentType,
              List<String> subFolders)
        Commits saving file - the file will be moved from temporary folder to the target place. If there is already the file with the same name in the target folder then it's replaced by the new one.
        Parameters:
        fileId - the file identifier from saveTempFile(OutputStreamWriterCallback)
        fileName - the original file name
        contentType - the file content type
        subFolders - the collection of sub-folders which determine where is the target folder for moving the file
